text:
Black and brown communities have experienced violence at the hand of extremism stemming from racism and white supremacy.

Surrendering to this continued violence is not an option. We must respond, and that’s why today I voted to pass the Domestic Terrorism Prevention Act.

In the Marines, I slept next to a burn pit. I cannot overstate how important it is get veterans exposed to toxic burn pits the care they deserve. News of the Senate’s progress is encouraging. 

Let’s get the Honoring our PACT Act signed into law.
https://t.co/jcA3BTEzfk

We mourn the 1 million lives lost to COVID-19. It’s important we also honor them with action. 

Please do what is necessary to keep one another safe. Get boosted, and head to https://t.co/4wsu9zefuz to order a 3rd round of free COVID-19 tests.

Today I proudly voted to pass the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act. 

We need to support a well-trained and diverse workforce, and that starts today by reversing decades of falling investment in workforce development.
https://t.co/j8mWpHZXza

It was an honor to meet Peter Hultqvist, Sweden’s Minister for Defense, today in Washington. @SwedeninUSA is one of our closest partners and I hope we can soon call them and Finland our NATO allies. https://t.co/Mc9ngJ5iQL

Rising gas prices hurt business owners who rely on their vehicle to earn a living.

That's why @RepDavids and I are calling on the IRS to increase gas mileage deductions for small businesses & independent contractors. Hardworking Arizonans deserve relief.
https://t.co/2eokNJ1Nss

Whether it’s aid to Ukraine, rebuilding America’s infrastructure, getting vets health care, or supporting an end to homelessness, ultra-MAGA Republicans routinely object and obstruct any policy. It’s their playbook. 

@HouseDemocrats deliver solutions while the GOP does nothing. https://t.co/bTJppXikx6
Excited to join @Morning_Joe at the top of the hour. Be sure to tune in! https://t.co/U76OCjlocU
